Articles.Content: I saw a screenshot of KER where there was a HUD showing information. It looked like glowing green numbers up near the atmospheric meter. There should be a button labeled HUD on the interface but I do not see it on mine. Can someone please help?

There are two branches of KER, the 1.0.x branch and the 0.6.x branch; only the 1.0 branch has the HUDs. Are you maybe using the 0.6 branch?

If you are using 1.0, can you share a picture with the KER interface open?

Ok, that's probably it. I'll check my computer later today. (I'm on my iPad right now)

EDIT: Yep, that's it. Thanks!
